displaytitle: Details of Two Churches, after drawing by Antonius van den Wyngaerde in the Bodleian Library
creditline: Gift of George L. Small, Class of 1943
inscribed:
in graphite, lower left: All Hallows [crossed out] St Mary Pattens | left, near the Tower
in graphite, center right: Very large | trees | St. Dunstan in the East | before the Tower

titles.title: Album containing 99 original drawings and 87 architecture, portrait, and costume studies of a documentary nature for the paintings Latimer Preaching at Paul's Cross and The Martyrdom of Ridley and Latimer.
Details of Two Churches, after drawing by Antonius van den Wyngaerde in the Bodleian Library
